home.title: Find Animal Shelters
home.paragraph1: Have you found an animal in need? Act now! Our website is your immediate gateway to finding the nearest shelter or veterinary assistance for any animal you encounter.
home.paragraph2: In a world where too many pets are abandoned, we empower you to make a responsible and compassionate choice. Discover local shelters and rescue options for animals in distress, and be the help they urgently need.
nearbySearch.totalShelters: Total {count} shelters within {radius} km from your location
